title: AI-Powered Resume Workshop
description: Learn how to optimize your resume using AI tools like ChatGPT and Claude. We'll cover ATS optimization, keyword strategies, and hands-on practice.
fullDescription: In this interactive workshop, you'll learn the latest techniques for leveraging AI to create compelling, ATS-friendly resumes. We'll walk through real examples, practice with live tools, and you'll leave with an optimized resume ready for your job search.

speakers.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
speakers.title: Career Services Director
speakers.bio: 15+ years helping students land their dream jobs in tech.

agenda.title: Welcome & Introduction
agenda.description: Overview of AI in job searching

agenda.title: ATS Deep Dive
agenda.description: Understanding how applicant tracking systems work

agenda.title: Hands-on AI Practice
agenda.description: Using ChatGPT and Claude to improve your resume

title: Technical Interview Prep: Data Structures & Algorithms
description: Prepare for technical interviews with practice problems, whiteboard sessions, and tips from engineers at top tech companies.
fullDescription: This intensive session covers the most common data structures and algorithm questions asked at FAANG companies and tech startups. You'll practice solving problems in real-time and learn strategies for approaching unfamiliar challenges.

speakers.name: Michael Torres
speakers.title: Senior Software Engineer
speakers.bio: NJIT alum ('19) who's conducted 200+ technical interviews.

speakers.name: Priya Patel
speakers.title: Engineering Manager
speakers.bio: Leads a team of 12 engineers and loves helping students break into tech.

agenda.title: Interview Overview
agenda.description: What to expect in technical interviews

agenda.title: Live Coding Demo
agenda.description: Watch engineers solve problems in real-time

title: LinkedIn Masterclass: Building Your Personal Brand
description: Transform your LinkedIn profile from basic to standout. Learn content strategies, networking tips, and how to attract recruiters.
fullDescription: Your LinkedIn profile is often the first impression recruiters have of you. In this masterclass, we'll optimize every section of your profile, discuss content creation strategies, and share networking techniques that actually work.

speakers.name: Jessica Williams
speakers.title: LinkedIn Top Voice
speakers.bio: Helped 500+ professionals land jobs through LinkedIn optimization.

agenda.title: Profile Audit
agenda.description: What makes a profile stand out

agenda.title: Networking Tactics
agenda.description: How to connect without being awkward

title: Panel: Breaking Into the AI Industry
description: Hear from professionals working in AI/ML roles at startups and Fortune 500 companies about career paths and skills needed.
fullDescription: The AI industry is booming, but breaking in can feel overwhelming. Our panel of AI professionals will share their journeys, discuss what skills actually matter, and answer your questions about building a career in artificial intelligence.
address: 323 Dr Martin Luther King Jr Blvd, Newark, NJ 07102

speakers.name: Dr. James Liu
speakers.title: ML Research Scientist
speakers.bio: Works on large language models and AI safety.

speakers.name: Amanda Rodriguez
speakers.title: AI Product Manager
speakers.bio: Ships AI features used by millions of people.

speakers.name: Kevin Park
speakers.title: Founder & CTO
speakers.bio: Building the next generation of AI tools for developers.

agenda.title: Career Journeys
agenda.description: How each panelist got into AI

agenda.title: Skills & Education
agenda.description: What you actually need to know

agenda.title: Networking
agenda.description: Meet the panelists and fellow attendees

title: Portfolio Review Night
description: Get your portfolio reviewed by industry professionals. Bring your laptop and receive personalized feedback.
fullDescription: Whether you're a designer, developer, or data scientist, your portfolio is crucial. Industry professionals will review your work one-on-one and provide actionable feedback to help you land interviews.

speakers.name: Multiple Industry Reviewers
speakers.title: From Various Companies
speakers.bio: Professionals from companies like Amazon, JPMorgan, and local startups.

title: Job Club Fall 2024 Kickoff
description: Our semester kickoff introducing Job Club's mission, upcoming events, and how to maximize your membership.
fullDescription: We kicked off the fall semester with an energetic introduction to Job Club. Members learned about our mission, met the leadership team, and got a preview of all the amazing events planned for the semester.

speakers.name: Prof. Keith Williams
speakers.title: Faculty Advisor
speakers.bio: Leading Job Club's mission to prepare students for AI careers.

title: Salary Negotiation Strategies
description: Learn proven techniques to negotiate your job offers confidently and maximize your compensation package.
fullDescription: Don't leave money on the table! This workshop covered research-backed negotiation strategies, how to evaluate total compensation, and real scripts you can use when negotiating with recruiters.

speakers.name: Rachel Martinez
speakers.title: Compensation Consultant
speakers.bio: Former recruiter turned compensation expert. Helped 1000+ engineers negotiate higher salaries.

title: Panel: Startup vs Corporate - Which Path is Right for You?
description: Alumni from both startups and Fortune 500 companies shared their experiences and helped students decide their ideal career path.
fullDescription: Four NJIT alumni with diverse career paths discussed the pros and cons of working at startups versus large corporations. Topics included work-life balance, growth opportunities, compensation differences, and company culture.

speakers.name: Jason Lee
speakers.title: Co-founder
speakers.bio: Left Google to start his own company. 3x founder.

speakers.name: Maria Santos
speakers.title: Senior Product Manager
speakers.bio: Built her career at big tech over 8 years.

title: System Design 101 for Interviews
description: Introduction to system design concepts and how to approach system design interviews at top tech companies.
fullDescription: System design interviews can be intimidating, but they don't have to be! This workshop introduced fundamental concepts like scalability, load balancing, caching, and database design through practical examples.

speakers.name: Alex Nguyen
speakers.title: Staff Engineer
speakers.bio: Designed systems handling millions of rides per day.

title: Networking That Actually Works
description: Practical strategies for building genuine professional relationships, both online and at events.
fullDescription: Networking doesn't have to feel awkward or transactional. This workshop taught authentic approaches to building professional relationships, following up effectively, and leveraging your network for career opportunities.

speakers.name: Dr. Emily Chang
speakers.title: Career Development Specialist
speakers.bio: Specializes in helping introverts network effectively.
